effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining [HP]{mechanic:hp}.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
effect_entries.short_effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.
